alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 25 at 1:30PM EST until December 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures between 28 and 32 degrees are forecast for 3 to 6 hours over interior Volusia and north Lake counties, up to 3 hours for coastal Volusia and up to 2 hours for most of Seminole, Orange and southern Lake counties. Normally colder locations in northwest Orange, western Seminole and southern Lake counties will see longer durations. The urban corridor between Orlando and Sanford should remain above freezing in the mid 30s. * WHERE...Volusia, Lake, Orange and Seminole counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County
